column4: would be a nightmare to try and get my mum's crappy small apps running on wine on ubuntu?
there is a compatability guide. the older the app the better
a game like minesweeper? or a game like doom?
a game like bridge baron, from looking at its gui, i doubt its using any modern, highpowered stuff. i think its the kind of game that runs on win95, and can be copied from cd rather than installing
